Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.observation.Observable<UserInterfaceObserver>
      • it.polimi.ingsw.observation.UserInterfaceObservable
        • it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInterface
    public class Board
extends UserInterfaceObservable
implements UserInterface
    The main class of GUI. It contains the scene 3D for the game graphics and a sub scene for the 2D menus
